Inspired by her French upbringing, Laura Mercier brings an authentic approach to the bath and body category, believing that fragrance is a personal signature. With the Crème de Pistache Body & Bath Collection, she has created playful yet decadent and sophisticated formulas inspired by the aura and aroma of the French pâtisserie.
products.What else you need to know: Crème de Pistache, inspired by the creamy and nutty aromas of pistachio desserts, is a decadent blend of gourmand ingredients with a combination of almond, praline, and hazelnut nuances and freshly whipped cream for a rich, luscious experience.
products.Suggested usage: Laura’s Secret: Layering the formulas allows for a longer-lasting fragrance experience that softly lingers all day.

products.What it is: A fast-absorbing, multipurpose moisturizer for all skin types.
products.What it does: This moisturizer is formulated with natural oils that soften the skin, make your bath a spa treat, and leave a light scent.
products.What else you need to know: "My husband gave me a surprise almond cookie as a gift one day and said it was 'just because.' This soft, warm, and soothing scent captures the feeling you get when someone surprises you just to let you know you're loved. For Bath: Add two to three tablespoons to a warm bath for soft, silky skin.
Massage oil: Apply a few drops into hands and rub together. Glide hands gently all over the body to relieve exhausted muscles or for a sensual touch.

Suggested usage: As a beard conditioner:  Dispense two to three pumps in palm of hand, rub through beard, working into hair and skin underneath.
As a facial and skin moisturizer:  (1) Apply a thin layer to slightly moist skin following bath or shower; (2) Perfect for rough patches on feet, elbows, and cuticles.

As a pre-shave oil:  (1) Spread a thin layer on slightly moist skin, allowing oil to penetrate beard growth for 10 seconds; (2) Apply Beard Lube™ Conditioning Shave or Supreme Cream Shave Lather over oil; (3) Shave; (4) Rinse with warm water.
For hair: (1) Apply a small amount to clean, towel dried hair from mid-length to ends; (2) Blow dry or let dry naturally; (3) Apply to dry hair to tame flyaways or condition dry ends.
For shaving: (1) Spread a thin layer on slightly moist skin; (2) Shave; (3) Rub residual oil into skin for deep penetrating moisture or rinse oil off with warm water and a wash cloth.
Precautions: If product enters eyes, rinse with water.

products.What it is: A triple-milled soap that gently buffs away dry, dull skin while cleansing the body to reveal a smooth complexion.
products.What it is formulated to do: Seaberry Exfoliating Soap gently buffs away dry, dull skin while cleansing the body to even skintone and reveal a radiant glow. The nourishing formula is fortified with seaberry oil, a powerful antioxidant rich in omegas that restores and softens the skin. Natural exfoliants of cranberry, bamboo, and bitter orange help diminish dehydrated skin, while shea butter nourishes and hydrates. Triple-milled to last longer, it produces a rich, non-drying lather for a luxurious cleansing experience.
products.What else you need to know: The story of seaberry: “When I was two, living in a small town in East Siberia, I tipped over a pot of boiling water and burned my arm. The doctor treated me with a pasty orange salve that I later learned was seaberry oil. Native to Siberia, this restorative oil has been used for generations as a natural cure.”—Lev Glazman, Fresh Co-founder
Suggested usage: Follow with Seaberry Restorative Body Cream.
Massage over wet skin and rinse.

products.What it does: Enriched with skin-soothing brown sugar and nourishing shea butter, this foaming bath and shower gel nourishes and gently cleanses the skin. It also shares Brown Sugar Body Polish's invigorating citrus scent.
products.What else you need to know: The inspiration for the original, all-natural Brown Sugar Collection began with Fresh Co-founders Lev Glazman and Alina Roytberg's childhood memories of their grandmothers using sugar as a natural remedy to heal cuts. Wanting to pass on this effective ritual, they bottled their shared tradition, pioneering the use of sugar in the beauty industry.

Shea Butter: Nourishes and hydrates the skin.
